title: Beef lasagne with ricotta
ingredients: ['675g minced beef', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '800g tomato based pasta sauce, such as Dolmio', '225g passata', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 small onion, diced', '450g grated mozzarella cheese', '425g ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons milk', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '9 lasagne sheets', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
